tool_description: Adjusts presentation content complexity based on audience knowledge level and time constraints, providing recommendations for content depth, pacing, and structure.

original_content_outline.description: Main content points or sections in the original presentation outline

interaction_time.description: Time allocated for Q&A and interaction in minutes

key_takeaways.description: Essential points that must be communicated regardless of complexity adjustment

error_messages: Empty content outline: At least one content point must be provided in original_content_outline
Invalid knowledge level: Must be 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', or 'expert'
Invalid duration: presentation_duration must be a positive integer
Invalid interaction time: interaction_time must be non-negative and less than presentation_duration
Empty key takeaways: At least one key takeaway must be specified
Invalid content type: Must be 'technical', 'business', 'educational', or 'motivational'
Invalid attention span: Must be 'short', 'medium', or 'long'
usage: Provide original_content_outline array, target_knowledge_level, presentation_duration, and key_takeaways. Optionally set interaction_time, content_type, and audience_attention_span. The tool returns adjusted content recommendations.

adjusted_outline.description: Content outline adjusted for target audience and time constraints

complexity_level.description: Recommended complexity level for the adjusted content

pacing_recommendations.description: Recommendations for content pacing and timing

content_priorities.description: Prioritized list of content elements from most to least essential

simplification_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for simplifying complex concepts
